dependency-lock-plugin Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2019-05-14  | Version: 1.1.1-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

Usage

Generate a dependency locked pom in target/pom-locked.xml.

<project>
  [...]
  <build>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.mpobjects.maven</groupId>
        <artifactId>dependency-lock-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>1.1.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>lock-dependencies</id>
            <goals>
              <goal>lock</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
  [...]
</project>
